                               throws KeepException

        Validate that a role doesn’t already exist in the ACL

        Parameters:
        existingRoles - roles in the ACL
        roleToCheck - role name without “[“ and ”]”, e.g. “Admin”
        Throws:
        KeepException - error if it already exists

      • getCleanRoleName

        public static java.lang.String getCleanRoleName(java.lang.String raw)

        Returns a proper role name, with no square brackets inside but around and limited to Maximum Role lenght

        Parameters:
        raw -
        • incoming role, might or might not have [ ]
        Returns:
        • role that does not have [ ], lenght limited
